content.rendered:
Directed by Abhiroop Basu

Written by Abhiroop Basu

Star Pankaj Tripathi(Ram Sundar). Vann Adrik(News Reporter Ashley Cooper). Hinal Aswani(NGO friend). Prashant Barot(Dalpat Bapu). Jiya Bhatt(Laali / Aarti). Raj Bhavsar(Villager). Kabir Daiya(Pintu). Devanshi Gharekhan(NGO friend).Ekavali Khanna. Spandan Modi(Bharat). Kinnal Nayak(Daksha). Kamini Panchal(Vimala). Nirav Patel(Deep). Ravi Thummar(Villager). Tarika Tripathi(Deeksha)

Language Hindi. Gujarati

Producers Kirati Amin. Abhiroop Basu. Aakash Ghoshal. Sushila Jain. Shireesha Kadiyala. Manan Raval. Samir Sarkar. Parth Savalia. Madhu Singhee. Tushar Tyagi

Production YouthIn Motion Pictures
